00034  * Lustre is a trademark of Sun Microsystems, Inc.

00036  * lustre/mdt/mdt_fs.c
00037  *
00038  * Lustre Metadata Server (MDS) filesystem interface code
00039  */
00040 
00041 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_MDS
00042 
00043 #include "mdt_internal.h"
00044 
00045 static const struct file_operations mdt_open_files_seq_fops = {
00046         .owner   = THIS_MODULE,
00047         .open    = lprocfs_mdt_open_files_seq_open,
00048         .read    = seq_read,
00049         .llseek  = seq_lseek,
00050         .release = seq_release,
00051 };
00052 
00066 int mdt_export_stats_init(struct obd_device *obd, struct obd_export *exp,
00067                           void *localdata)
00068 {
00069         lnet_nid_t *client_nid = localdata;
00070         struct nid_stat *stats;
00071         int rc;
00072         ENTRY;
00073 
00074         LASSERT(!obd->obd_uses_nid_stats);
00075 
00076         rc = lprocfs_exp_setup(exp, client_nid);
00077         if (rc != 0)
00078                 /* Mask error for already created /proc entries */
00079                 RETURN(rc == -EALREADY ? 0 : rc);
00080 
00081         stats = exp->exp_nid_stats;
00082         stats->nid_stats = lprocfs_alloc_stats(LPROC_MDT_LAST,
00083                                                 LPROCFS_STATS_FLAG_NOPERCPU);
00084         if (stats->nid_stats == NULL)
00085                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00086 
00087         mdt_stats_counter_init(stats->nid_stats);
00088 
00089         rc = lprocfs_register_stats(stats->nid_proc, "stats", stats->nid_stats);
00090         if (rc != 0) {
00091                 lprocfs_free_stats(&stats->nid_stats);
00092                 GOTO(out, rc);
00093         }
00094 
00095         rc = lprocfs_nid_ldlm_stats_init(stats);
00096         if (rc != 0)
00097                 GOTO(out, rc);
00098 
00099         rc = lprocfs_seq_create(stats->nid_proc, "open_files",
00100                                 0444, &mdt_open_files_seq_fops, stats);
00101         if (rc != 0) {
00102                 CWARN("%s: error adding the open_files file: rc = %d\n",
00103                         obd->obd_name, rc);
00104                 GOTO(out, rc);
00105         }
00106 out:
00107         RETURN(rc);
00108 }
